data.lyric:
[ti:Sunflower (《蜘蛛侠：平行宇宙》电影插曲)]
[ar:Post Malone/Swae Lee]
[al:Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (Soundtrack From & Inspired by the Motion Picture)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sunflower - Post Malone/Swae Lee
[00:00.25]Lyrics by：Khalif Malik Ibin Shaman Brown/Louis Russel Bell/Austin Richard Post/William Walsh/Carter Lang/Carl Rosen
[00:00.50]Composed by：Khalif Malik Ibin Shaman Brown/Louis Russel Bell/Austin Richard Post/William Walsh/Carter Lang/Carl Rosen
[00:00.76]Produced by：Louis Bell/Carter Lang
[00:01.01]Swae Lee：
[00:04.38]Ayy ayy ayy ayy
[00:09.26]Ooh
[00:09.75]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[00:12.40]Ooh
[00:16.08]Ayy ayy
[00:20.50]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[00:27.38]Needless to say I keep it in check
[00:29.95]She was all bad-bad nevertheless
[00:32.30]Yeah
[00:32.58]Callin' it quits now baby I'm a wreck
[00:34.90]Wreck
[00:35.33]Crash at my place baby you're a wreck
[00:37.56]Wreck
[00:38.04]Needless to say I'm keeping her in check
[00:40.57]She was all bad-bad nevertheless
[00:43.27]Callin' it quits now baby I'm a wreck
[00:45.91]Crash at my place baby you're a wreck
[00:48.64]Thinkin' in a bad way losin' your grip
[00:51.27]Screamin' at my face baby don't trip
[00:53.89]Someone took a big L don't know how that felt
[00:56.55]Lookin' at you sideways party on tilt
[00:59.34]Ooh ooh some things you just can't refuse
[01:04.17]She wanna ride me like a cruise and I'm not tryna lose
[01:10.86]Then you're left in the dust unless I stuck by ya
[01:16.34]You're the sunflower
[01:18.85]I think your love would be too much
[01:21.54]Or you'll be left in the dust unless I stuck by ya
[01:27.02]You're the sunflower you're the sunflower
[01:31.21]Post Malone：
[01:31.69]Every time I'm leavin' on ya
[01:33.96]Ooh you don't make it easy no
[01:36.19]No no
[01:36.97]Wish I could be there for ya
[01:39.64]Give me a reason to
[01:41.94]Oh
[01:42.63]Every time I'm walkin' out
[01:44.44]Oh
[01:44.65]I can hear you tellin' me to turn around
[01:46.96]Oh oh
[01:47.49]Fightin' for my trust and you won't back down
[01:49.55]No
[01:50.05]Even if we gotta risk it all right now oh
[01:52.60]Now
[01:52.88]I know you're scared of the unknown
[01:54.66]-Known
[01:55.57]You don't wanna be alone
[01:57.33]Alone
[01:58.16]I know I always come and go
[01:59.81]And go
[02:01.01]But it's out of my control
[02:04.27]And you'll be left in the dust unless I stuck by ya
[02:09.62]You're the sunflower
[02:12.15]I think your love would be too much
[02:14.86]Or you'll be left in the dust unless I stuck by ya
[02:20.33]You're the sunflower you're the sunflower yeah yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Sunflower (《蜘蛛侠：平行宇宙》电影插曲)]
[ar:Post Malone/Swae Lee]
[al:Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (Soundtrack From & Inspired by the Motion Picture)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.25]//
[00:00.50]//
[00:00.75]//
[00:01.01]//
[00:04.38]//
[00:09.26]//
[00:09.75]//
[00:12.40]//
[00:16.08]//
[00:20.50]//
[00:27.38]毫无疑问 我总能掌控局势
[00:29.95]不过 她总是花样很多
[00:32.30]//
[00:32.58]快停下 宝贝 我现在脑子很乱
[00:34.90]脑子很乱
[00:35.33]在我的家里大闹 宝贝 你的脑子很乱
[00:37.56]脑子很乱
[00:38.04]毫无疑问 我总能将她手到擒来
[00:40.57]不过 她总是花样很多
[00:43.27]快停下 宝贝 现在我脑子很乱
[00:45.91]在我的家里大闹 宝贝 你的脑子很乱
[00:48.64]你胡思乱想 失去理智
[00:51.27]冲着我大叫 宝贝 不要激动
[00:53.89]有人大败了一场 不知道是何滋味
[00:56.55]看着你东倒西歪 派对上醉得不省人事
[00:59.34]有些事情你无法拒绝
[01:04.17]她想坐在我身上 尽情驰骋 我也不甘示弱
[01:10.86]要是我没有守在你身边 你只能被世俗埋没
[01:16.34]你像一朵向日葵
[01:18.85]我想你的爱让人难以抗拒
[01:21.54]要是我没有守在你身边 你只能被世俗埋没
[01:27.02]你像一朵向日葵 你像一朵向日葵
[01:31.21]//
[01:31.69]每当我要离开你时
[01:33.96]你总是难舍难分
[01:36.19]不
[01:36.97]真希望我能在你身边
[01:39.64]给我一个理由
[01:41.94]//
[01:42.63]每当我要出门时
[01:44.44]//
[01:44.65]我都能听见你叫我转过身来
[01:46.96]//
[01:47.49]努力赢得我的信任 你不肯退缩
[01:49.55]不
[01:50.05]即使现在我们必须冒这个险
[01:52.60]现在
[01:52.88]我知道你害怕未知的事物
[01:54.66]未知的事物
[01:55.57]你不想一个人
[01:57.33]一个人
[01:58.16]我知道我总是来去匆匆
[01:59.81]来去匆匆
[02:01.01]但我也是迫不得已
[02:04.27]要是我没有守在你身边 你只能被世俗埋没
[02:09.62]你像一朵向日葵
[02:12.15]我想你的爱让人难以抗拒
[02:14.86]要是我没有守在你身边 你只能被世俗埋没
[02:20.33]你像一朵向日葵 你像一朵向日葵
